utils.utilsRaster module¶

class utils.utilsRaster.ModelRasterDatasetHBV(fn_base_map, fn_temp_thres=None, fn_ddf=None, fn_soil_max_wat=None, fn_soil_beta=None, fn_aet_lp_param=None)¶

Bases: object

write_parameter_input_file(fn_out)¶

Writes a json dictionary with the parameter name keys and the path to files holding the parameter map. This file is needed to run the hydrovehicle :param fn_out: filename to write the json dictionary :return: None

class utils.utilsRaster.RasterParameterIO(fn_base_raster)¶

Bases: utils.utilsRaster.ReadRaster

Class to manipulate raster model parameters

write_array_to_geotiff(fn_out, np_array)¶
Wrapper of function defined in parent class to write numpy arrays
as tiff file using metadata from a template GeoTiff map.
Parameters:
  • fn_out – filename of output tiff file, string
  • np_array – numpy array to be converted to tiff
Returns:

None
class utils.utilsRaster.ReadRaster(fn_base_raster)¶

Bases: object

Base class to read raster datasets, retrieve and keep metadata, and write geotiffs

utils.utilsVector module¶

Classes to manipulate vector datasets used in daWUAP.

The ReadVector base class reads and writes fiona geometry objects. This class is inherited by the other three classes in this module.

class utils.utilsVector.ModelVectorDatasets(fn_network=None, fn_subsheds=None)¶

Bases: object

Class to handle the the manipulation of all vector dataset in the model

write_hvb_parameters(outfn, params=None)¶

Adds or updates the vector file of model subwatersheds with the hbv RR model parameters. If params is not provided, the dataset is updatd with default parameter values

Parameters:
  • outfn – filename for updated vector network
  • params – list of parameter dictionaries with format []
Returns:

None
write_muskingum_parameters(outfn, params=None)¶

Adds or updates the vector network file with the Muskingum-Cunge parameters. If params is not provided, the dataset is updated with default parameter values.

Parameters:
  • outfn – filename for updated vector network
  • params – list of parameter dictionaries with format [{‘ARCID’: ID, ‘e’: value, ‘ks’: value},{}]
Returns:

None
class utils.utilsVector.ParseNetwork(fn_vector)¶

Bases: utils.utilsVector.ReadVector

Returns a dataframe.

Class to parse the model stream network. It calculates the connectivity matrix during the initialization and makes it available as a class variable. This class has the following public methods:

  • get_parameter(param): returns a list with the value of this parameter for all river reaches
get_parameter(param)¶

Retrieves a list of values associated with the :param: parameter :param param: string with name of the parameter to retrieve :return: list of parameter values in the order they appear in the river network dictionary

class utils.utilsVector.ReadVector(fn_vector)¶

Bases: object

Base class to read vector datasets using Fiona.

Reads and stores metadata from fiona objects, and facilitates the writing of vector files.

class utils.utilsVector.VectorParameterIO(fn_vector)¶

Bases: utils.utilsVector.ReadVector

Class to provide model parameter fields adn values to network and basin vector datasets. It has the following public methods:

read_features()¶

return a generator of features in the dataset :return: fiona generator

write_dataset(fn, crs=None, driver=None, schema=None, params=None)¶

Writes a vector file using fn_vector as template :param fn: outfile name :param crs: :param driver: :param schema: :param params: dictionary :return: None
